StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetPFTHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT P.PFT_ID, P.NWA_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(11), P.PFT_DATE, 106) AS PFT_DATE, COALESCE(PFT_HEIGHT, 0) AS PFT_HEIGHT, COALESCE(PFT_WEIGHT, 0) AS PFT_WEIGHT, COALESCE(PFT_BODY_FAT_PCT, 0) AS PFT_BODY_FAT_PCT, COALESCE(PFT_RUN_MINUTES, 0) AS PFT_RUN_MINUTES, COALESCE(PFT_RUN_SECONDS, 0) AS PFT_RUN_SECONDS, COALESCE(PFT_PULLUPS, 0) AS PFT_PULLUPS, COALESCE(PFT_HANG, 0) AS PFT_HANG, COALESCE(PFT_CRUNCHES, 0) AS PFT_CRUNCHES, COALESCE(PFT_SCORE, 0) AS PFT_SCORE FROM PFT P INNER JOIN NWA N ON (P.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND N.NWA_ID = @NWAID) ORDER BY P.PFT_DATE DESC, P.PFT_ID DESC
